The aforementioned documentation is only correct if using the `robfig/cron/v3` go package, but currently on v1.2.0, which lacks such support.

https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/blob/ad4dc3f1f483defd1442ab0337a133dd2df89d84/go.mod#L33

For full `CRON_TZ=` support from the upstream library, probably need to bump to a more recent release:
```
github.com/robfig/cron/v3 v3.0.1
```

title: Support Timezones in the cron schedule
